text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @EsperDoD @SecPompeo "A country that turned out eight combat aircraft every hour at the peak of World War II could not even produce enough 75-cent masks or simple cotton nasal swabs for testing in this pandemic." https://t.co/0jQ7aueMDt
